channel.title: CVE Feed for Basix -- NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder – Contact forms and much more
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Basix -- NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder – Contact forms and much more

item.title: CVE-2023-52120|2024-01-05T09:25:36.560Z -- basix -- nex-forms%20%E2%80%93%20ultimate%20form%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20forms%20and%20much%20more
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Basix NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder – Contact forms and much more.This issue affects NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder – Contact forms and much more: from n/a through 8.5.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-50838|2023-12-28T20:04:58.740Z -- basix -- nex-forms%20%E2%80%93%20ultimate%20form%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20forms%20and%20much%20more
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Basix NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder – Contact forms and much more.This issue affects NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder – Contact forms and much more: from n/a through 8.5.5.
